page.title: 20ACTIVITIES IN INVERURIE
page.content:
A variety of activities are available for all ages in Inverurie. Pages 6 and 7 refer to recreation in the burgh.
There are a number of clubs and organisations which people can join. Scouts, Cubs, Guides, Brownies and Boys Brigade are available for children as well as a swimming and a pony club. Youth clubs also meet in various halls.
A survey revealed that hobies occupied most of people's time, with watching T.V. a close second. Adults spend time at clubs and participating in sports. A large number of those surveyed were members of the public library. Other activities mentioned were attending the cinema, the bingo and entertainment.
